bug.author: poutyface
bug.description: I met a problem for exporting caffe model. exporters.caffe don't export eps param of BatchNormalization. Chainer sets eps param to 2e-5 by default. however, Caffe sets eps param to 1e-5 by default. The output value becomes very different in the regression task.

comments.comment: Thanks for the feedback! We'll fix this in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chainer/chainer/pull/4884>#4884</denchmark-link> .
